name: Anoat Operative
Lore: 'Independent mercenaries operating out of Anoat work with some of the locals, such as Ugnaughts. These operatives inform the Empire of all suspected Alliance activities.',
Text: 'While at an Anoat site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is power +1 (or +2 if your Ugnaught is on Anoat) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Anoat from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
